content:

thought: To craft a golden_sword, I need to craft gold_ingot. To craft a gold_ingot, I need to smelt a gold_block. Therefore, I will move the gold_block from slot 19 to slot 1 so that I can smelt it.
Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
